001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Kind;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Place;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Structure;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Target;
007import picocli.CommandLine;
008
009import java.util.Arrays;
010import java.util.EnumSet;
011
012/**
013 * This class represents the rendering details and is used as an optional parameter to
014 * all methods in {@link org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.ObjectPrinter ObjectPrinter} interface.
015 */
016public class RenderSpec {
017
018    public enum Feature {
019        SHOW_NULL,
020        SHOW_EMPTY,
021        RENDER_HTML_DOC,
022        EMBEDDED_SVG_IMG,
023        USE_HTML_CSS,
024        NESTED_SECTIONS
025    }
026
027    private final Highlight highlight;
028    private final EnumSet<Feature> featuresSet = EnumSet.noneOf(Feature.class);
029
030    public RenderSpec(Highlight highlight, Feature... featuresArr) {
031        this.highlight = highlight;
032        this.featuresSet.addAll(Arrays.asList(featuresArr));
033    }
034
035    public boolean hasFeature(Feature feature) {
036        return featuresSet.contains(feature);
037    }
038
039    public String dumpOuterHtml(String innerHTML, Structure struct) {
040        // TODO: move it to HTML-dumpers
041        String outerStyle = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(Kind.BG, struct, Target.HTML_STYLE));
042        if (hasFeature(Feature.RENDER_HTML_DOC)) {
043            return OuterTagUtils.outerHtmlDivStyle(innerHTML, outerStyle,
044                String.format("%s as HTML (rendered by Core-Utils)", struct));
045        } else {
046            return OuterTagUtils.outerDivStyle(innerHTML, outerStyle);
047        }
048    }
049
050    public String dumpOuterSvg(String innerSVG, Structure struct, int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount) {
051        // TODO: move it to SVG-dumpers
052        String outerStyle = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(Kind.BG, struct, Target.SVG_ATTRS));
053        if (hasFeature(Feature.RENDER_HTML_DOC)) {
054            if (hasFeature(Feature.EMBEDDED_SVG_IMG)) {
055                return OuterTagUtils.outerHtmlImgSvgAttrs(
056                    innerSVG, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle,
057                    String.format("%s as SVG (rendered by Core-Utils)", struct));
058            } else {
059                return OuterTagUtils.outerHtmlSvgAttrs(
060                    innerSVG, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle,
061                    String.format("%s as SVG (rendered by Core-Utils)", struct));
062            }
063        } else {
064            return OuterTagUtils.outerSvgAttrs(innerSVG, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle);
065        }
066    }
067
068    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
069
070    String highlightAnsi(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
071        String ansiStyle = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.TXT_ANSI));
072        if (ansiStyle == null) {
073            return str;
074        }
075        String ansiRenderStr = String.format("@|%s %s|@", ansiStyle, str);
076        return CommandLine.Help.Ansi.AUTO.string(ansiRenderStr);
077    }
078
079    String highlightHtmlStyle(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
080        String styleValue = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.HTML_STYLE));
081        if (styleValue == null) {
082            return str;
083        }
084        return String.format("""
085            <span style="%s">%s</span>""",
086            styleValue, str);
087    }
088
089    String highlightHtmlCss(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
090        String cssClassName = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.HTML_CSS));
091        if (cssClassName == null) {
092            return str;
093        }
094        return String.format("""
095            <span class="%s">%s</span>""",
096            cssClassName, str);
097    }
098
099    String highlightSvgAttrs(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
100        String svgAttrs = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.SVG_ATTRS));
101        if (svgAttrs == null) {
102            return str;
103        }
104        return String.format("""
105            <tspan %s>%s</tspan>""",
106            svgAttrs, str);
107    }
108
109    String highlightSvgClass(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
110        String svgClassName = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.SVG_CLASS));
111        if (svgClassName == null) {
112            return str;
113        }
114        return String.format("""
115            <tspan class="%s">%s</tspan>""",
116            svgClassName, str);
117    }
118
119    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
120
121    public String highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
122        return highlightSyntaxAnsi(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
123    }
124
125    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
126        return highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
127    }
128
129    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlCss(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
130        return highlightSyntaxHtmlCss(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
131    }
132
133    public String highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
134        return highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
135    }
136
137    public String highlightSyntaxSvgClass(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
138        return highlightSyntaxSvgClass(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
139    }
140
141    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
142
143    public String highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
144        return highlightAnsi(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
145    }
146
147    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
148        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
149    }
150
151    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlCss(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
152        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
153    }
154
155    public String highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
156        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
157    }
158
159    public String highlightSyntaxSvgClass(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
160        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
161    }
162
163    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
164
165    public String highlightNullAnsi(Structure struct) {
166        return highlightAnsi(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
167    }
168
169    public String highlightNullHtmlStyle(Structure struct) {
170        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
171    }
172
173    public String highlightNullHtmlCss(Structure struct) {
174        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
175    }
176
177    public String highlightNullSvgAttrs(Structure struct) {
178        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
179    }
180
181    public String highlightNullSvgClass(Structure struct) {
182        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
183    }
184
185    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
186
187    public String highlightKeyAnsi(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
188        return highlightAnsi(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
189    }
190
191    public String highlightKeyHtmlStyle(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
192        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
193    }
194
195    public String highlightKeyHtmlCss(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
196        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
197    }
198
199    public String highlightKeySvgAttrs(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
200        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
201    }
202
203    public String highlightKeySvgClass(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
204        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
205    }
206
207    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
208
209    public String highlightValueAnsi(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
210        return highlightAnsi(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
211    }
212
213    public String highlightValueHtmlStyle(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
214        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
215    }
216
217    public String highlightValueHtmlCss(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
218        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
219    }
220
221    public String highlightValueSvgAttrs(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
222        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
223    }
224
225    public String highlightValueSvgClass(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
226        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
227    }
228
229}
